strapiPost.title: New Exhibit On Display At Crystal Bridges
strapiPost.photoCredit: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiPost.content:
A new exhibition is on display at Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art. 

  • Light: The new exhibition is called The Light Fantastic and will be on display until May 30. It is an exhibition of 27 artistsâ€™ works from the 19th century and is presented as a meditation on light. It features painting, sculpture, printmaking, and photography. 
  • Qualities: The artists each used light in their art differently and each piece is affected by the light in the gallery. Some pieces of art are more abstract than others, intended for interpretation. This exhibit is free for the community to visit.

For more details about the exhibit, click HERE.
